original_title: Dado Moroni - Live In Berly Hills
overview: Italian pianist and composer Dado Moroni is revered on both sides of the Atlantic for his driving piano power and harmonic ingenuity. Now, with the release of his Resonance Records debut "Live in Beverly Hills" (available March 8th), the international jazz journeyman jumps to the very front of the improvised instrumental pack. The album features bassist Marco Panascia and drummer Peter Erskine
title: Dado Moroni - Live In Berly Hills
